title: Event Marketing For "The Philosophy of Absolute Batman" Panel Talk Series
description: Drive awareness and ticket sales for “The Philosophy of Absolute Batman”—a thought-provoking panel talk series blending pop culture with ethics, psychology, and design. I’ll develop and run a multi-channel campaign (social teasers, creator partnerships, campus/community outreach, PR, and email) with clear conversion funnels to RSVPs. Expect a launch kit—messaging, assets, ad sets, landing copy—and weekly performance reports optimizing toward CPA, attendance rate, and post-event engagement.

milestones.title: Phase One: Strategy & Asset Development
milestones.description: Research audience segments, define messaging pillars, and create the launch kit (copy, visuals, landing page, social templates, and press outreach materials).

milestones.title: Phase Two: Campaign Activation & Outreach
milestones.description: Run targeted campaigns across social, email, and community channels; activate partnerships with creators, schools, and local groups; and drive RSVP conversions through ad sets and organic buzz.

milestones.title: Phase Three: Event Engagement & Reporting
milestones.description: Manage live engagement during the panel series, amplify highlights on digital channels, and deliver a post-event performance report with key metrics, learnings, and recommendations.
